extendedInfo.description: This android app allows you to easily and quickly tether your phone Internet connection to any Wi-Fi enabled device (without 3g/4g usb modem).â¦â¦â¦ Please read full description prior to post 1-Star Rating. â¦ It will NOT work on most SPRINT devices! â¦ We cannot guarantee that it will work for your phone, because tethering feature is very hardware and rom-build dependent. â¦â¦â¦This app is a quick and easy alternative to the standard android manual hotspot configuration.â¢ Shares your mobile Internet with any PC, tablet, smartphone or game consoleâ¢ Does not require root access and  jailbreak your phoneâ¢ One click to setup and activate droid WiFi hotspotâ¢ Realtime stats of hotspot usage. (available in PRO version only)â¢ It is free WiFi hotspotIf you like this app please give it a good review and rating. :) âââââPLEASE NOTE: this application is ad-supported. It uses banner ads, desktop shortcut and push notification ads model. If, at any time, you feel unhappy about our in-app ads please consider ad-free PRO version instead.Familiarise yourself with your carrier's Terms of Service before use this application.â¦â¦â¦Notice: correct spelling is: tether, not teather, teter or tethers---Creating an app takes time and money, In order to keep creating great (and free!) apps, we are using a new search service to monetize our apps. With this service we are able to create more great apps for you guys. This option bundles a few search points (icon, bookmark and homepage) for you to use. You can erase these easily and with no effect to our app. Thanks!

reviews.title: Love at first sight, now divorced!
reviews.comment: If she didn\'t install other apps behind my back and constantly naaaag me to buy her stuff we\'d be together forever.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It works!
reviews.comment: Great because I don\'t want to pay my carrier extra money for tethering capabilities. I understand that the ads are a necessary evil but it\'s a great App
reviews.author: Doreen Pierre

reviews.title: Just delete the icons
reviews.comment: Those are not apps but ads as icons. You have a choice to delete those icons on your screen. The app is easy to set up and it\'s free, so it\'s fair enough to have ad icons.
reviews.author: Ho-Ling Poon

reviews.title: Love this app
reviews.comment: Works perfect for ps3 hate all the popo ups would b five star but too many adds

reviews.title: Crap
reviews.comment: Installed it and I go barraged with TOO many ads. It downloaded 3 other apps and when I went to actually use the app to tether my internet to my tablet, it wouldn\'t even work. What a waste of time.

reviews.title: THE BEST
reviews.comment: After searching and downloading over 20 apps of wifi giving  u ran into this one and its the first to work  :-) thank you guys yall rule

reviews.title: Flooded with ads
reviews.comment: I love the app. It\'s proven extremely useful and haven\'t had any problems. However my phone is constantly flooded with adds because of it. That\'s extremely annoying. This is why the three stars.

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Its the best one for me.I\'ve tried several different ones and let me tell ya this is hands down the best....

reviews.title: Good, but annoying
reviews.comment: It works great and is easy to use, but you are constantly being bombarded with push notifications, whether it\'s open or not, and it installs ads into your phone. It annoyed me so much I considered getting the pro one, but it is insanely expensive. I might as well get my carriers tethering service!
reviews.author: Yariel Lopez

reviews.title: Worked well on rooted phone
reviews.comment: Have a rooted phone - S2 Skyrocket. First ran the tether unlocker app and then ran this app. It worked for me. Only annoyance is the ad notification,  but then its what u get 4 free.
reviews.author: Leo Francis

reviews.title: Annoying pop-ups
reviews.comment: Pop ups all the time annoying. The opt-out app does not work. Don\'t know why waste my time downloading it. Stop annoying pop-ups I give it a5 star.
